html:
10.24.22  4:25 pm   Why don't you use capital letters

      i do, but the reason you are unaware is probably because you are paying absolutely no attention

10.24.22  2:27 pm   what's the planned release date for your newest work?

     oct 25

     what's something new you've learned this time around?

      i learned that the 'follow path' feature does not seem to have an option to derive the timing from the distance between the points, i.e. to always reach each next point in the same amount of time and therefore offer the ability to control the timing just by changing the location of the points. instead it insists on re-evaluating the pace to always move at the same speed through physical space. which may be useful for cars or driving but for human body motion such as walking, dancing, etc, i need the point-to-point time equivalency but unfortunately i was shocked to find out that that feature is seemingly not readily available, at least so far as i can tell. but i was able to build an elaborate workaround based on some distant memories of trigonometry, particularly the pythagorean theorem which i still remember from that time i spent as a child trying to comprehend the true size of toilet paper squares

10.24.22  2:12 pm   do you get all the references people are trying to make to your videos in these questions or are even aware that's what they are

      i suppose if i didn't know, then i wouldn't know

10.24.22  2:06 pm   What's your opinion on the fact there could be no afterlife and we could all cease to exist completely. Also the fact that whatever we do will not impact the future because nothing would matter because we would all be dead. That the earth could be consumed by a blackhole and cease to exist as a whole or that the earth could be obliterated in a matter of nanoseconds by a supernova.

      my opinion on your facts is that you tend to stuff your own opinions in there as well, and generally spin the story in such a way as to evoke a specific emotional reaction

10.24.22  12:36 pm   A few of your songs make references to "the show", do you think everyday is an episode of a show?

     every moment

     If so, what kind of show is today?

      it's multi-show

10.24.22  9:46 am   Can metal music be funky?

      yes

10.24.22  8:29 am   is cheese made of the moon

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.24.22  6:14 am   what's your favourite book?

      whichever one has the most pages. i'm just a page fiend really when you get right down to it

10.24.22  3:44 am   what is the most efficent way to teach a cockroach how to dance?

      place it directly onto the dance floor

10.24.22  2:35 am   I just really dont think i was made for school. i hate it so much. i have always hated it with all of my being. i remember hating it when i was in elementary school. i remember hating it in middle school. i remember hating it in high school. i hated it in high school so much. now im in college, and i still fucking hate it. i hate it so much, and im only a month into my freshman year. i cannot for the life of me imagine getting through the week, let alone the goshdamn year or the next 4 years. what the fuck do i do, i cant live like this.

      have you thought about being the teacher

10.24.22  1:52 am   Will there be any river/streams in your next YouTube video? 

      it's possible

10.24.22  12:32 am   Do you think you would ever design your own software for video editing?

      that sounds like something i would do

10.24.22  12:32 am   what is your favorite word?

      i like them all equally

10.23.22  10:40 pm   are your written answers the same that you would give if you were talking to someone?

      sometimes

10.23.22  8:52 pm   do you wanna be on my radio show right now?

      sure. i've been meaning to spend more time on radios

10.23.22  8:15 pm   Is there a possibility that within your videos site a more subliminal message? 

      sure. but if it's subliminal to you then it's sublininal for me too. so in that case we're all in this together

10.23.22  7:02 pm   Do you want to build a chocolate sculpture of Winston Churchill with me?

     that sounds lovely but i think it would be wise to start with some other lower ranking authority figures first

     If so, should we build it out of cardboard or unsold copies of The Bends?

     how about leaves

10.23.22  6:31 pm   What is a song

      the scientific community is offering a hefty cash prize for anyone who can put forward a solid definition

10.23.22  6:24 pm   do you look back on your previous music/videos and think about what you could've done better? And why not?

      the time when i'm most aware of how much better it could be is when i'm making it

10.23.22  5:13 pm   In what corner of the universe do you live in?

      every corner is the center. i live in that one

10.23.22  4:09 pm   ok.... so if you pick a spot on the circle of fifths, the one to the right of that one is the dominant and the one to the left of it is the subdominant....

      that sounds about right

      and it just goes all the way around this way, right?.

     yes

     does that make the Circle of Fifths a daisy chain?

      if you chain it too far it will start to have a disorienting effect

10.23.22  3:31 pm   Opinion on industrial civilization and it's future?

      gonna be some changes made

10.23.22  3:30 pm   Do you plan to make any more "Non-song" videos like 2 friends on the beach?

      yes

10.23.22  12:59 pm   What do you think about the concept of time?

      hard to believe, but then i admit it would be even harder to believe without it

10.23.22  11:27 am   weirdest instrument you've played?

      i have never played a weird instrument

10.23.22  9:06 am   I have very strong opinions on certain pieces of media, be it songs or movies or books and associate a lot of emotions and ideas with them, that I'd like to share with others. But I don't have people close to me who'd be interest in my ramblings, nor do I feel comfortable being a reviewer and broadcasting my takes to the public.
How to cope with that?

      how about going online

10.23.22  6:35 am   Is it YOU inside the box marked "Fragile, Do Not Open"?

      it's whomever is watching the video

10.23.22  4:29 am   whats the difference between uppercase letters and lowercase letters?

      usually the size, and other small aesthetic differences depending on the letter

10.23.22  3:29 am   why do we exist?

      there's always new reasons. you can invent new reasons. i would tell you one of the existing reasons, but any one of those may briefly seem unappealing, just to make room for new reasons, which of course no one can predict

10.23.22  12:52 am   How do you produce the strange randomness that your music has, yet have it tie together and make sense?

      i just try to use high morals

10.23.22  12:33 am   when the 2 friends were driving, what location did you choose for that scene?

      not ohio, that's for sure

10.22.22  11:05 pm   piece vs peace, who wins

      ..... wore?

10.22.22  10:55 pm   is "being nice" a personality trait

      damn right it is

10.22.22  10:23 pm   How would I go about going directly to the center of outer space?

      you're there already

10.22.22  8:34 pm   are you gonna make another Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education

      i think that one frolicked too much and i scared myself

10.22.22  1:26 pm   What came first, the chicken or the egg?

      neither one has arrived yet

10.22.22  10:29 am   in the la de da de da de da de day oh music video which instruments did you use most frequently

      my voice

10.22.22  9:20 am   do you  like mud slop

      it likes me

10.22.22  5:17 am   Did you choose what the 2 friends eat?

     yes

     If so, why?

     because i wrote the thing

10.22.22  12:03 am   In your unboxing video, what was in the box marked "Fragile, do not open?"

      it looks like i was taking the common ordinary situation of a box saying 'Fragile' implying for you to be careful with it, and i tried to heighten the stakes by instructing you to not even open it. which creates a curious debacle on screen

10.21.22  8:28 pm   Whats your favorite vehicle

      staircase

10.21.22  8:10 pm   what is your opinion on comic sans

      too good. don't use

10.21.22  7:36 pm   how about an alternate version of the myth of sisyphus 

      how about phyphusis

10.21.22  6:23 pm   how do you define the "present time" when everything you perceive already happened slightly before you perceive it?

     it's this 'looseness' that gives rise to everything we think talk and dream about. everything we hear in music, or see in the cinema

       that is, if the present is when you perceive something, wouldn't everyone have a slightly different idea of what is happening in the present, depending on how long it takes them to perceive what is happening?

     yes

10.21.22  3:45 pm   how to overcome to fear of dying one day

      start developing a list of things you wanna do first

10.21.22  11:50 am   what is the secret ingredient in your songs that make them so gosh darn bangin

      a love/hate relationship with all other music

10.21.22  11:16 am   are you a 5th dimension elder god in the shape of a dunce?

      no

10.21.22  8:11 am   How can I escape Cincinnati

      you could take a hot air balloon. it will only last a couple of minutes, but it's something. hope that helps

10.21.22  5:27 am   how do i become more interesting without having to start liking things i dont like

      start looking for things you do like. this is a win-win because you like interesting things

10.21.22  4:12 am   In your video "if the world doesn't end", why is the text 'it's wrong' right side up, while the text 'it's right' is upside down?

      i don't recall that, but that sounds like common sense to me
